data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Antwerp's Faris Haroun has been booked in Beveren.
In the minute 25, Goal! Lior Refaelov gives Antwerp a 0-1 lead in Beveren.
Goal! Antwerp extend their lead to 0-2 through Nana Opoku Ampomah.
That's a fine assist from Faris Haroun.
In the minute 35, Jordan Lukaku (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
Ivan Leko is making the team's first substitution at Freethielstadion with Alexis De Sart replacing Lior Refaelov.
Goal! Dieumerci Mbokani extends Antwerp's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Beveren.
The home team have replaced Brendan Schoonbaert with Aleksandar Vukotic. This is the first substitution made today by Nicky Hayen.
In the minute 46, Joe Efford is replacing Aboubakary Koita for Waasland-Beveren at Freethielstadion.
Andreas Wiegel for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Jonathan Lardot and receives a first yellow card.
Aurelio Buta (Antwerp) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 68, Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a second substitution, with Cristian Benavente replacing Nana Opoku Ampomah.
Abdoulaye Seck is booked for the away team.
Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a third substitution, with Simen Juklerod replacing Jordan Lukaku.
In the minute 87, Waasland-Beveren make their third substitution with Jenthe Mertens replacing Andreas Wiegel.
Jonathan Lardot blows to end the match. The final score is 0-3.
